bucket.database

类 BucketObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • bucket.database.BucketObject
  • 直接已知子类:
    BmobBase, DatabaseObject, PhoneBook

    public abstract class BucketObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Bucket对象抽象类，实现对象与数据库操作
    作者:
    Hansin
